info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 06 at 4:30AM CDT until September 06 at 5:00AM CDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 500 AM CDT FOR SOUTHERN DUPAGE COUNTY... At 430 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Downers Grove, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Naperville, Bolingbrook, Wheaton, Downers Grove, Elmhurst, Lombard, Addison, Woodridge, Glen Ellyn, Hinsdale, Lemont, Burr Ridge, Oak Brook, Westmont, Lisle, Darien, Villa Park, Bensenville, Warrenville, Northlake, Willowbrook, Clarendon Hills, Hillside, Willow Springs and Berkeley. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
